name: Taylor Velasquez
title: Budtender/trimmer
coverLetter:
Hello my name is Taylor Velasquez

I am applying for this job at your company. Based on the posted description, I believe I am very qualified for the position. I've worked in the MMJ industry for 6 years now. I've been a budtender as well as a haverst grower. I trim about 1 1/2 pounds a day. The MMJ industry is my future career. I would appreciate a interview at your continence.
experience:
Fountain of Welbeing as a trimmer manager/budtender for 4 years

I worked at multiple grow houses in Glendale and Downtown. As a trimmer/assistant grower. For 2 years.
